text: Nayi, Alatala yi a fala Esayi xa, a naxa, “Ɛ nun i ya dii xɛmɛn Seyari-Yasubu7.3 Seyari-Yasubu bunna nɛɛn Heburu xuini fa fala “Yamaan muxu dɔnxɛne xɛtɛma nɛn sa keli konyiyani.” xa mini Axasi ralandeni ige ramaraden faxaraxiin xunna ra,7.3 Ige ramaraden naxan geyaan na. dugi xane xɛɛ ma kiraan xɔn.
